article: Sunday  _  (1) the favorite day for our family. My parents  _  (2) not  _  (3) work. My sister and I  _  (4) go to school. We  _  (5) at home and  play  (6) in the morning. In the afternoon, my sister and I  _  (7) out to buy some different things. My sister likes songs. She  buys  (8) new tapes. I buy story books, a frisky, a kite and things  like  (9) that. We also buy some small gifts for our parents. We  _  (10) them. They love us very much. We live in a happy family.
